nestor 0.0.0.9000
  • Home
  • Reference

wraper of auc from ROCR

auc.Rd

wraper of auc from ROCR

auc(pred, label)

Arguments

pred

predictions
label

labels

Examples

data=missing_from_scratch(n=100,p=10,r=1,type="scale-free", plot=FALSE)
PLNfit<-norm_PLN(data$Y)
#> 
#>  Initialization...
#>  Adjusting a PLN model with full covariance model
#>  Post-treatments...
#>  DONE!
MO<-PLNfit$MO
SO<-PLNfit$SO
sigma_obs=PLNfit$sigma_obs
#-- use true clique for example
initClique=data$TC
#-- initialize the VEM
initList=initVEM(data$Y,cliqueList=initClique,sigma_obs, MO,r=1 )
nestorFit=nestor(data$Y, MO,SO, initList=initList, maxIter=3,verbatim=1)
#> 
#> nestor ran in 0.198secs and 3 iterations.
#-- obtain criteria
auc(nestorFit$Pg,data$G)
#> [1] 1
